SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION_UPDATEROW
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Updates a given row of Financial Transaction extension table.
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
-- ============================================= -- Author: Memphis Sellers -- Create date: -- Description: Updates a given row of Financial Transaction extension table. -- ============================================= create procedure dbo.USR_USP_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION_UPDATEROW @FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID uniqueidentifier, @DIRECTDEBITSCHEDULECODEID uniqueidentifier, @CREDITCARDSCHEDULECODEID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEDBYID uniqueidentifier = null, @DATECHANGED date = GETDATE as begin if @CHANGEDBYID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEDBYID output;
UPDATE [dbo].[USR_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION] SET [DIRECTDEBITSCHEDULECODEID] = @DIRECTDEBITSCHEDULECODEID ,[CREDITCARDSCHEDULECODEID] = @CREDITCARDSCHEDULECODEID ,[CHANGEDBYID] = @CHANGEDBYID ,[DATECHANGED] = @DATECHANGED WHERE [ID] = @FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID end
